title: Sacrificed: A Cozy Witch Mystery Short Story Book Set
description: DISCOUNTED FOR A LIMITED TIME ONLY!A Boxed Set Of Exciting Cozy Witch Mysteries and MORE. Available FREE On Kindle Unlimited! Book The Mail-Order Bride Mystery; Book The Sacrifice; Book Intertwined Fates These Are Short Stories About Magic, Love, Grief, And Everything In between. Does The End Truly Justify The Means, Or Is This Another Case Of Pure Evil? Either Way, Some Kind Of Sacrifice Must Be Made... The Only Question Is, What Or Who??
author: Greta Star
